attributes.action: Stop holiday firms from charging single parents adult prices for one child to make up for the fact they are the only adult
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There are millions of single parent families out there who want more than anything to, once a year, take their child/children away on a holiday, only to discover that because they are a lone parent they have to pay the full adult price for one of their children!! How is a single parent meant to afford to pay for two adults, Its discrimination and it shouldnt be allowed

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
